name: Absolute Unit
description:
Absolute Unit was made in less than 48 hours at the Berklee Game Jam. It was a four person team, two sound designers/composers, on artist and one programmer.

You play as a skinny dog named Boofus who doesn't have an owner. He sees that all the other happy dogs with their owners are a little chubby. He decides to embark on a quest to get all the treats to become an absolute unit and get an owner.

Credits:

Jason Chen  - Artist 

David Chihlas - Composer/Voice Actor

Dayna Mooney - Composer/Sound Designer/Voice Actor

Cam Perry - Programmer

Follow Jason on most platforms @gemhunter178 or @gemhunterdoesart on Instagram

Follow  David on Instagram @davidchihlas
